site.title: ICPC EELU — Fayoum Center
site.description: Join the ICPC EELU community to master algorithms, build teamwork, and compete through ECPC and ACPC on the path to the ICPC World Finals.

hero.title: Compete. Learn. Advance.
hero.subtitle: Join the ICPC EELU community to master algorithms, build teamwork, and compete through ECPC and ACPC on the path to the ICPC World Finals.

overview.text: The International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC) is a multi-tier, team-based competition where teams of three solve algorithmic problems under time pressure.

steps: Start training and form a team of three

support.eelu: Proudly supported by the Egyptian E‑Learning University (EELU).

sponsors.line: Partner with us to support talented students.

items.a: Yes, ICPC teams are three students.
Start with Get Started and Resources sections.
